1414.name: OA SS 60
1414.Applications: Rebuilding wornout parts that faces wear and impact combined with increased working temperatures. (Excellent alloy for making cutting tools out of mild steel)
1414.Suitable_For: 59-62 HRc hardfacing alloy for cutting edges, wood shredders, knives, recycling equipment, HSS, High speed tool steel alloy. Cutting edges on knives and share blades, pumps, mixer blades, wood shredders etc.. (Excellent alloy for making cutting tools out of mild steel)
